short_description: fastpath function to cast/convert columns from one datatype to another.
long_description: fastpath function to cast/convert columns from one datatype to another.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns which needs to be casted/converted to another datattype
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns which needs to be casted/converted to another datattype

argument_clauses.name: TargetDataType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify target datatype(s) into which target columns need to be converted. If one value is provided, it applies to all target columns. If more than one value is specified, each TargetDataType value applies to corresponding TargetColumns value (in the order specified by the user).
argument_clauses.description: Specify target datatype(s) into which target columns need to be converted. If one value is provided, it applies to all target columns. If more than one value is specified, each TargetDataType value applies to corresponding TargetColumns value (in the order specified by the user).
